action.name: Ink Blade
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Rousing Verse
entries: When a creature the pledgemage can see within 30 feet of it fails a saving throw, the pledgemage magically weaves together stirring prose, allowing the creature to reroll the saving throw and use the higher result.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
